website_summaries.verdict: Has the most to offer for the price of those tested on our shortlist.
pros: Its large 16-inch front wheel and wide rear wheels provide exceptional performance
cons: Our testers found it somewhat difficult to assemble

website_summaries.verdict: Though not quite as sturdy as some competitors, it's a fun tricycle with "old school" appeal and a reasonable price.
pros: An iconic model that has provided generations of fun
Quality features include the large front wheel (16 inches), bold colors, and adjustable seat
cons: Though the build is durable, it's not quite as solid as models with metal components
The tires don't have adequate traction on all surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Worn out wheel
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this Big Wheel, but the wheel wore out within 6 WEEKS.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Junk don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Pedals dont stay on, head unit is sloppier than a 1970 ford van. Lol. Why? Because the design is horrible and cheaply made. This is not even close to the old school ones. I'm wondering why they bother going to the trouble of making if their going to cut corners the cause it to not function or stay together. Cut pennies and make junk. Pedals fell apart in less than 2 feet. I had to redesign so my grandson could be in a race the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Big Wheel nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Instructions seemed fairly clear. The seat back is a bit too vertical but my son enjoys riding. I bought the radio flyer for my older son which is a better fit I think. To be completely honest, I bought this big wheel from a nostalgic point of view since I had one back in the mid 70s. Next time will be a radio flyer.
customer_reviews.author: JH Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Grows with your child
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this. It is a lot like the old big wheels from when we were younger. The seat can be moved forward and backwards for different sized children which is a great feature so your child can grow with it. It's a great way to teach your child how to pedal and steer without worrying about them falling very far.
customer_reviews.author: C Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: My son does love it but the handle bars seem loose even though ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving a 4 star only because it doesn't seem as well made as I remember. My son does love it but the handle bars seem loose even though I have them as tight as they will go. The molded plastic still has some sharp edges that I had to trim so my son wouldn't hurt his hands. Not quite worth the money I paid. Seems more like a 30 dollar toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Knott

customer_reviews.title: Great Big Wheel that functions well
customer_reviews.text: Grandson says, "It's totally awesome!!" He likes the colors & the seat is easily positioned & in place for his size. He already has put it to use & the wheels grip the driveway & keep him moving without any difficult. His former Big Wheel caused him to roll backwards from time to time; this one is much better & he likes the fact that he is able to go fast & not have to correct his direction due to wheels slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Pedal fell off on 2nd use and unable to simply snap in back on without a small piece of metal. POOR
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with quality of this product. My son used this twice only and a small piece of metal that held the pedal on slipped off and we couldn't find it. It seems the pedal can't be kept in place without this piece. The other pedal is held in place with a notch in the metal bar. The right side does not appear notched to hold this small piece of metal in place. Therefore the product is useless to us currently. I believe the replacement for this part is selling for around $5 online. This lapse in quality is beyond my comprehension on a child's toy that should otherwise be durable.
customer_reviews.author: D-leichtful

customer_reviews.title: ... around the neighborhood on this thing almost effortlessly and like it better than his bike
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son cruises around the neighborhood on this thing almost effortlessly and like it better than his bike. A win-win for us!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua B.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, cannot withstand normal use before falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, would not buy again. Front pedals could not stand up to the incredible forces of a 2.5 year old toddler girl who can barely reach said pedals (the flimsy metal washers used to keep the pedals attached cannot withstand any side loading). Most stickers fall off shortly after application. Front tire has zero traction, back tires already getting holes after a month. Everything about this toy is just cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her big wheel, and you don't really see alot of kids with these now a days, but my daughter loves to roll around the house on it. Pretty solid and easy to put together. I know we're definitely going to get some years out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndzey

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for 4 year olds and older.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I had ordered 30+ years ago for my young son's, my grandson's have the same tricycle. Both of my grandsons are really big boys. However, even at 95% on height, I think that this tricycle is best for those that are 4 years old. Regardless, my grandsons will soon grow into this machine. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Geronimo John

customer_reviews.title: Not what the seller is showing in the add
customer_reviews.text: After ordering the Big Wheel from amazon I read the reviews, I then decided to call All in Toy's and ask them about there product, Original Big Wheel 16 Inch Tricycle, after talking to them I was told the original company went out of bussiness about 2 years ago and another company bought the patent rights to this product. I asked if the product was the same, and was told the it was the one with the hand brake and spoked front wheel. it is not the same as the picture shown in Amazon, so I cancelled the order. Amazon needs to conferm a sellers product and conferm if it truly is an original product. Disapointed.............
customer_reviews.author: Don K. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the Original Big Wheel from the 80s, but its a cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a grandchild for Christmas because it looked just like the one her father loved when he was her age....big mistake. It was very cheaply made, the steering was so tight she could barely turn the wheel and one of the pedals came off after riding about 5 minutes. We returned it and bought the Radio Flyer brand.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Simpson

customer_reviews.title: no brake!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the coolest part of the big wheel when I was a kid was the brake that allowed you to spin out! This big wheel doesn't have the brake. I am sure I could rig one up but being advertised as a original big wheel isn't 100% on point
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my Grandsons 3rd birthday and he absolutely loved it. I love the colors of this big ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Grandsons 3rd birthday and he absolutely loved it. I love the colors of this big wheel, it was perfect to transform into a spiderman big wheel with all the spiderman stickers I bought and applied to it. One happy little Birthday Boy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi/7

customer_reviews.title: Worst toy assembly ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a nightmare to assemble. Seriously, an exercise in frustration. Start with lots of time and patience and expect to get very angry. This is one of those times I would pay more for a pre-assembled model. My son hasn't even seen it yet and I hate it. And yes, it seems to be as cheap as everyone says it is. I don't expect it to last long. Definitely not like the big wheel I remember as a kid. It's pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for a family member. I'm a little disappointed with the quality. It seems like a cheap dollar-store knock off, but the price doesn't reflect that. I was expexting much higher quality, especially in the tires, for what i paid for. It's still cheaper than others on the market, but I'm not sure how long the tires will last. The back tires have no tread at all - just smooth plastic. The boy I bought it for has had some trouble pedaling it, and he's a tall 5 year old. I sure hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Brought back many childhood memories and just had to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought back many childhood memories and just had to get it for our 4 year old grandson. Expect he will get several years use before he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Berleigh16

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandkids, was not sure the bikes would be strong enough. But we have had them two or three years now. They have a blast riding down hill. So far no bending or breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyne Brace

customer_reviews.title: It put the best smile on my grandson's face
customer_reviews.text: It put the best smile on my grandson's face. It was worth it to me. Oh and btw, the length of the bike is awesome. He is almost 3 and he still cannot reach the pedals so he will have this a long time. My other grandson had one and it still was good but we gave that one away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retro FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Sorry. Not the original Big Wheel. I had one, so did my brother. Material is totally different and causes a traction problem that is fine for spin outs but not for a five year old who needs to pedal to the garage when playtime is over. You know that feeling when you see parts of a toy that just don't look that sturdy and well constructed? That describes how I felt pulling everything out of the box. Big disappointment to my lil' racer in training :( Not Amazon's fault. Manufacturer fail. Advice: Hold on to those great memories of the awesome Big Wheel some of us remember and keep looking for something fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Ordering Another
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this big wheel to our 4 year old son in 2006. Our son loved it and rode it whenever we went out to play. Unfortunately, in April our daughter caught it with the side of her car while backing out of the carport. Broke the handlebar and bent the axel. Of course I couldn't fix it, so I'm ordering another. Our little boy pushes it to the top of our slightly inclined driveway, hops on, holds his feet up, and away he goes! It doesn't turn over easily while turning curves like his old little 3 wheel did. Low to the ground and can take the curves better, but will still turn over. Great 3 wheel trike though!
customer_reviews.author: Old New Mom

customer_reviews.title: He thinks he's really cool and calls it his motor cycle
customer_reviews.text: An oldie but a goodie! Our kids had Big Wheels and now our two year old grandson is loving this. He can't quite reach the pedals yet (he's on the smaller side) but he's making due by using his feet on the ground. He thinks he's really cool and calls it his motor cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great update on childhood toy!
customer_reviews.text: I had the original as a kid (still have it but just a bit too big to ride it now). I have twins, so I can't expect them to share - so I had to pick up the new one. It is different in some ways, but most are just modern updates. Very satisfied with its construction, and building it was a breeze. Kids totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: JUNK STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT IT IS NOT WHAT YOU REMEMBER AS A CHILD !!!TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly sheet was so poorly written that by the time it was put together the back wheels where to tight and will not even turn ..The phone number to get help from is no longer in service the website is not running so I am shafted with a peice of junk that i can only look at and had to go buy a different present for my grandson for his birthday !!!
customer_reviews.author: cannonball

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original for 40 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like the original from 40 years ago. Same exact plastic parts. This is still the best design, in my opinion. (provided your kids are the right size (3-8 years old).
customer_reviews.author: philg

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our three year old grandchild who absolutely loves it. The Big Wheel is well made and operates smoothly. We would definitely recommend this tricycle.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: The tricycle is as described, but the washers holding ...
customer_reviews.text: The tricycle is as described, but the washers holding the pedals on don't work. Right now, we have no pedals on it, have to get new washers to put the pedals back on. The little guy just loves it, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Fox

customer_reviews.title: I had read other reviews about the difficulty to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: I had read other reviews about the difficulty to assemble - I am NOT handy! On the day of my grandson's party I got up 2 hours early to make sure I got through the assemblage. I was done in 25 minutes - a breeze. I had time for a quick work-out, read the paper and had an extra cup of coffee. I could have slept in! And the product??? Just as I remember when I bought one for my son. My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Muk

customer_reviews.title: This was actually kind of hard to assemble. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This was actually kind of hard to assemble. I had to get out a drill and drill holes in one of the parts where I was supposed to be able to use a screw. Also, it's really cheaply made. The pedals won't stay on it. Very disappointing product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and hours of fun for 4yr-olds
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 big wheels for my kids and the instructions and assembly are easy for one person. If you are handy enough with a phillips head screwdriver and a hammer, these put together quickly. My twins 4 yrs love their bigwheels and with the adjustable seat-back, means they can use them for awhile. I have found an outlet for a lot of their energy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy from the past!  This one is terrific!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my great-grandson for his 3rd BD. We could barely get him off of it. Great toy that's been around for years. This one is solid, secure and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw of 8

customer_reviews.title: Not the Original Big Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. It was not worth the price I paid ($55). The plastic is cheap, and there is little to no traction on the wheels. The front wheel slips constantly when my son rides it. I would like to return it, but can't take it apart. This is NOT even close to the original Big Wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cawthard

customer_reviews.title: After putting them together I was worried my 7 year old grandchild was too big but it worked great for her
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 big wheels for my grandkids to ride when they come over. After putting them together I was worried my 7 year old grandchild was too big but it worked great for her! Very happy with the big wheels and my grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Reiser

customer_reviews.title: and this one for my grandson is not as big nor as sturdy as the ones they had
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the original Big Wheel. Both my children had them when they were young, and this one for my grandson is not as big nor as sturdy as the ones they had. The material is cheap, it is cheaply put together, and smaller than the original. Don't try and pass this off in your advertising as the ORIGINAL BIG WHEEL. It is anything but...
customer_reviews.author: No name please

customer_reviews.title: Soo cool. Not quite like the original when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Soo cool. Not quite like the original when I was a kid, but close enough for my 4 year old to love and go crazy on. Great well made product. Durable and strong, for a plastic tryke.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew81

customer_reviews.title: Big Wheels bike
customer_reviews.text: Great trike for grandkids, easy to put together for this grammie, and my kids remembered their BigWheels 30 +yrs ago!
customer_reviews.author: Annmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Giving to my grandson, brought back memories of my own childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The pedal broke off within an hour of it being in use. Not the best purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids to ride and skid around the drive way.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this, just as I did when I was a kid. It doesn't have the hand brake as many used to but that is OK. I wish the steering handle had a tighter fit with the yoke piece, it is loose. I drove a wood shim down in the gaps to tighten it up.
customer_reviews.author: cmeyers

customer_reviews.title: Pedals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 Big Wheels and the pedals keep falling off of 2 of them. They were assembled properly and it has been very annoying to have this keep happening. I would like an email or a phone call from Amazon due to the fact that it has been impossible to reach their customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Jakubek

customer_reviews.title: My kid rides this all over the house.
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love the big wheel. My kid rides this all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: K. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! It is exactly like the ones we had growing up. I think the kids will probably ride it until they are at least 8. The seat has 3 adjustments so it can grow with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS ORIGINAL
customer_reviews.text: THIS ITEM IS DEFINATELY NOT AS THE ORIGINAL AND SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED TO ADVERTISE AS SUCH. IT IS A SMALLER AND A CHEAPLY BUILT RIPOFF OF THE ORIGINAL. IT REQUIRES TOTAL ASSEMBLY WHICH IS DIFFICULT BECAUSE THE PARTS DON'T FIT AND THE INSTRUCTIONS ARE MINIMAL AT BEST. MY KIDS GREW UP WITH THE ORIGINAL BIG WHEELS IN THE 70'S AND LOVED THEM SO I WAS ANXIOUS TO HAVE MY GRANDDAUGHTER EXPERIENCE THE FUN BUT THIS IS A REAL DISAPPOINTMENT.
customer_reviews.author: ricknden

customer_reviews.title: This was a Christmas gift for my 5 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 5 year old granddaughter. For now she has ridden it in her basement.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Fabitz

customer_reviews.title: My children loved this when they were young so I got this ...
customer_reviews.text: My children loved this when they were young so I got this for my grandson. Whatever ever keeps the peddles on is missing and he hasn't been able to ride it to this day. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one my son used for years back in the late 70's
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old grandson's birthday. After reviewing newer versions, I chose to go with the original. Has been used hard in races with his cousin. It takes a little time and patience to assemble but well worth it. Sturdy, safe, and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: I have put these together many times and never had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have put these together many times and never had any trouble. The last two I ordered have lost 3 of 4 pedals have come off. :(
customer_reviews.author: G from Knoxville

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Plastic wheels have NO traction and my son (6) gets so frustrated trying to ride it because he wants to go fast but the pedals just keep turning and the wheel won’t do anything but turn in place. Directions are awful and it takes at least an hour to put together. My son has only ridden it twice because of weather, but it’s too late for me to return it. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: They loved it until they started riding it and the "cap ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandchildren to ride when they were at our house. They loved it until they started riding it and the "cap nuts" fell off the very first time!! Talk about disappointed kidsos!! Retailers don't carry the cap nuts you must order them for $3.50 and pay $20 to have them shipped! Ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: Big Boy loves the Big Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of buying this after reading the reviews critical of the assembly instructions. The box arrived 3 business days after ordering and the Big Wheel was assembled in 40 minutes. My son proudly rides it in the neighborhood with older kids, so this has given him another way to keep up with the crowd. So far it has held up well. Only time will tell. Definitely worth the enjoyment for son and parents.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Oleary

customer_reviews.title: pedals wont stay on
customer_reviews.text: peddals keep falling off despite fixing....they must not have right parts....kind of worthless without pedals that will stay on
customer_reviews.author: Megan Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Child loves it (3yrs old) HOWEVER the aluminium washers to ...
customer_reviews.text: Child loves it (3yrs old) HOWEVER the aluminium washers to keep the peddles on are less than to be desired.!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Only used it less than one pedal turn. Pedal ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it less than one pedal turn. Pedal fell off due to defective locking washer. After going to find a replacement part, the only one to fit would not allow the pedal to turn. Replacement one shipped and it had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fun little trike
customer_reviews.text: My son had one of these when he was my grandson's age, and he still remembers happily scooting around with it for hours on end. The grandson seems to have the same take on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Q

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: A bit tedious to assemble, especially the decals, but our grandson was thrilled when we gave it him for his birthday. Priceless!!!
customer_reviews.author: My2cents

customer_reviews.title: there is one skinny bolt holding main frame to steering column and it doesnt slide (turn) easily. no grip on wheels
customer_reviews.text: tough to steer. there is one skinny bolt holding main frame to steering column and it doesnt slide (turn) easily. no grip on wheels. kids constantly spinning wheel trying to get the thing moving. Not like the old school Big Wheel of the 70's and 80's!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks the same as the one I had many years ago
customer_reviews.text: What a giant pain in the ass to put together, that said, it seems to be of the same quality that I had as a kid many years ago. My almost 3 yr old is too short for it though, but hoping to get some use out of it this spring.
customer_reviews.author: arrggghhh

customer_reviews.title: NOT a good product as of Feb 2016
customer_reviews.text: This big wheel did not have the right parts to put it together properly. The wheels keep falling off. I have no problem assembling products, generally, but this did not have the correct parts in the box to make it work. ABSOLUTELY not worth any money.
customer_reviews.author: LetterMan

customer_reviews.title: It is not the toy you bought for your children.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson, it is no where near the quality of the one we bought for his father 39 years ago. Poorly constructed of inferior materials, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Greger C. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Big Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for when he visits. He was starting to outgrown a smaller one we had and his brother will soon be riding it. It arrived on time, was fairly easy to put together and we have had no problems at all with it. I hesitated to order it because of some of the reviews but it has worked just fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Beale

customer_reviews.title: May work for a taller child
customer_reviews.text: My son had one of these so I bought this for my granddaughter. She can't reach the pedals. The one that can reach the pedal finds it hard to steer and it doesn't work well even on cement driveway. I don't recommend it because it does not work as well as the ones that were built years ago.
customer_reviews.author: RuthL

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and play with it for hours. I did give 3 stars because it is super noisy when you turn the steering wheel. It sounds like a very loud trumpet hahahaha I always know where my kid is!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE AND CHEAP QUALITY..DONOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY IS TOO POOR PLASTIC AND NOT AS AS EXPECTED. IT COULD EASILY GET BLOW AWAY BY THE WIND. IT'S TOO EXPENSIVE FOR WHAT I WAS CHARGED. PRICE SHOULD BE NOT MORE THAN $15.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the handle bar is misplaced. Make it so tight, the wheel won't turn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Wheel fell off on first ride. No traction on sidewalk..hard to ride.JUNK Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still a great toy for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: Eh can find better quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and parts are wiggely but my son still loved it
customer_reviews.author: Keep Life Easy

customer_reviews.title: Pain to build
customer_reviews.text: Rugged and old school perfection. Took over an hour to build, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Workman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yo is slightly to short. But will grow in to it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen marie

customer_reviews.title: although I know it's going to be loved. The years it has been on the market ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened it yet and it isn't for me, although I know it's going to be loved. The years it has been on the market give it credibility and I have no doubts about it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: lisaschoen

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original !!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. a pedal came off and we couldn’t get it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyette S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my three year old grandson, he was thrilled
customer_reviews.author: pheavrin

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Plastic wheels provide absolutely no traction on concrete or grass. Glad it was cheap, will donate.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Buy One Today!
customer_reviews.text: I have given 2 of these to grand children boys.They become speed obsessed that low to the ground. The enjoyment they get is terrific to watch.Both boys didn't learn to skid the front wheel until they were 5 years old.I had to order new front wheels.
customer_reviews.author: cwire

customer_reviews.title: Big Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Toddler unable to reach pedals yet...Soon. Love it...Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smaller than the original big wheel and no lever to spin out
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, and I love that the seat is adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: 123mandy321

customer_reviews.title: Giving this Big Wheel 1 star because it is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving this Big Wheel 1 star because it is so poorly made. My child received this as a gift and cannot use it because the pedals slide off the silver bar that holds the pedals in place. There is no way to fix this other than to buy another set of pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica  Lemmo

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 4 year old grandson and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old grandson and the front tire just spun on the tile and the front sidewalk
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 5 year old son with Cerebral Palsy and he can sit on it well. I needed a bike that was low to the ground for worry that he would fall off and this is perfect the seat adjusts up far enough for him to reach the pedals even though he cant pedal he loves it and is really happy when on it. My 2 year old can also ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Hay

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little difficulty putting together otherwise seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Risa Dunne

customer_reviews.title: great item for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: great item for a toddler. My 3 year old barely reaches the pedals but he is small for his age.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very adamant on getting this for our 4 yr olds bday. A nightmare to get the back wheels on, and the bike does not steer, it literally does not steer, the handle bars are stif they cannot be turned even after apply WD40 the handle bars just don't move. Can't turn left or right, so if my son wants to turn the bike he has to take his feet of the pedals and stand up and turn it. it really should be priced at $20 for what you get. We could of gotten something decent for a little bit more money. Something you buy for cheap at a garage sale, definitely not worth $50.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: This item would receive a 5. However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: This item would receive a 5. However, the decorative stickers began peeling off almost immediately. My grandson loves to play with it when he visits.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Big Wheels
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 35, had one when he was 3. Bought one for Grandson and what fun he had. Now his little brother has it and it will go to another boy in family soon. Even though made of heavy plastic, it has withstood 3 boys and I'm sure it will keep being handed down.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Luvs Flow

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my foster child. It is not the quality that Big Wheels were when my adult children were little, but our little boy loves it. I like that is is low to the ground, thus safer than a bike when riding in a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie A. Small

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 grandkids so I bought 3, should have bought 6 to keep at our house. My sons loved them in the late '70's and my grandchildren love them now. What fun they have had! The stickers will not last long, they fall off, and we have to continually tighten the handel bar screws. Other than that we love them.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Pursell

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, it has been around for years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, it has been around for years and my grandkid loves it as much as my kids did, when they were youngsters. Contains no electronics, does not require batteries, and it will not cause hyper giant thumbs. Forces child to interact with surroundings instead of playing turtle, while hunched over a screen.
customer_reviews.author: Omnes Omnibus

customer_reviews.title: Not built as tough as they used to be. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not built as tough as they used to be. The rear tire's plastic seem really thin. Not sure if it will wear out fast or not, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ubu

customer_reviews.title: The Original
customer_reviews.text: Present for Grandson who's Father remembers having A Big Wheel as a child. "The Original Big Wheel" is just that. Great quality and hours of fun. Will recommend to friends!
customer_reviews.author: cher55

customer_reviews.title: Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his big wheel, however the quality is not very good for a $200.00 toy! Totally overpriced. You are paying for the name Big Wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Schuster

customer_reviews.title: great the way the seat moves up and he will ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this item legs not long enough to touch pedals, great the way the seat moves up and he will probably be able to ride this toy for several more years
customer_reviews.author: pkimb

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend it for a child any younger
customer_reviews.text: Big Wheels are a classic. I'm not sure what age is listed in the description but my grandson is 3 1/2 and very physical but he still has a little trouble with it. I would not recommend it for a child any younger.
customer_reviews.author: Larke

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even make it a year
customer_reviews.text: This barely lasted 9 months and for 5 of those isn't wasn't being used due to inclimate weather. The front wheel is literally falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L Fearn

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat expensive for this style of tricycle, but a better value then others found on the web.
customer_reviews.text: The classic. This was the best value to be found on the web for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: DIIGGER

customer_reviews.title: These things are great once you get them put together
customer_reviews.text: These things are great once you get them put together. Trying to get the star washers and the caps on the rear axle and the crank was very hard. Probably a second pair of hands would help.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson was sooooo happy to have this big wheel at our house for ...
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson was sooooo happy to have this big wheel at our house for Christmas! He had a grand time riding it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together except the directions do not tell ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together except the directions do not tell you that the handlebars can only fit in one direction and the description of how to tap the wheel locks in place is totally lacking regarding which end of the mallet to use. Not having a block of wood to tap the wheel locks on was a real downer.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to put together for the most part and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it! It was pretty easy to put together for the most part and we did get it on time. Would recommend it for others.
customer_reviews.author: Maiken81

product_meta.title: Big Wheel 48727 Tricycle, 16-Inch, Red
product_meta.description:
Big Wheel 48727 Tricycle, 16-Inch, Red

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Original Big Wheel is back!! Features include: 3 position Grow With Me seat, a low center of gravity for safe riding, easy on…easy off body styling, an oversized front wheel for fast action peddling and wide rear wheels for sidewalk gripping action! The Original Big Wheel is easy to assemble and assembles in minutes using simple hand tools. Recommended Weight Limit is 70 pounds. Recommended for ages 3 - 8.
feature_bullets: Grow With Me 3 Position Adjustable Seat
